page.title: 12MY GRAN
page.content: MY GRAN WORKS IN THE HOTEL AND SHOP. SHE WORKS FROM NINE O'CLOCK UNTIL FIVE O'CLOCK. SHE ALSO DOES BED AND BREAKFAST. SHE IS ALWAYS BUSY. SOMETIMES I STAY AT MY GRAN'S AT THE WEEKENDS. SHE HAS FIVE GRANDCHILDREN. SHE COLLECTS STAMPS AND GIVES SOME TO HER GRANDCHILDREN. I HAVE THE MOST BECAUSE I AM THE OLDEST. SHE HAS SIX CHILDREN OF HER OWN. FIVE OF THEM LIVE IN THE VILLAGE AND MY AUNT HAS JUST COME BACK FROM A HOLIDAY IN SYDNEY. THE TREE IN FRONT OF MY GRAN'S HOUSE HAS JUST BEEN CUT DOWN BECAUSE IT WAS MOVING. EVERY MORNING WE STOP AT MY GRAN'S ON THE WAY TO SCHOOL AND SHE GIVES US A PLAY-PIECE.
